page.title: 16H.M.S GALATEA AT HULL
page.content: H.M.S. GALATEA is a Royal Naval frigate.It is a reasonably small vessel used for anti-submarine detection.It is equipped with modern computers, weapons and a Wasp helicopter for this purpose. The main threat to our nation comes from the Russians who have submarines equipped with missiles armed with nuclear warheads, as do we. Much of the ship's time is spent promoting goodwill around the world and in this cause visits Hull quite often. On their last visit to Hull they brought the Wasp to Mountbatten School to show the children and they let Mr.P Simmons fly back to the ship in it to take slides for the Domesday Project. During its time in port the ship is open for visiting and the crew took part in parades in the city centre.
